pr_title: [CDAP-11010] Fixes saving name of the pipeline to save the pipeline as draft

timeline.bodyText: Other than name, what else can trigger a saveMetadata event?
timeline.author: njbriggs

replies.bodyText: Right now changing name and description (part of metadata section) triggers the save. Other than that the user can click on "Save" on the top panel to save the pipeline as draft.
replies.author: ajainarayanan
